summary: This is an email from Jim Molinelli to an unspecified recipient, transmitting a copy of a sealed warrant signed by Judge Smith with an SDNY case number. The sender indicates a charging document will follow.

persons.name: Jim Molinelli
persons.context: Appears as the sender of an email transmitting a copy of a sealed warrant and promising a charging document.

persons.name: Danny Ortiz
persons.context: Listed as a carbon copy recipient of the email regarding the sealed warrant.

persons.name: Judge Smith
persons.context: Mentioned as the judge who signed the sealed warrant that is the subject of the email.

connections.description: Molinelli is sending an email about a legal document to Ortiz, indicating a professional working relationship.
Molinelli is transmitting a document (a warrant) that was signed by Judge Smith.

events.title: Transmission of Sealed Warrant
events.description: Jim Molinelli emails a copy of a sealed warrant, signed by Judge Smith and bearing an SDNY case number, to a recipient, with a promise to send a charging document.

keyFacts: A sealed warrant was signed by Judge Smith in an SDNY case.
The warrant and an upcoming charging document were being transmitted via email on June 29, 2020.
The communication indicates ongoing legal proceedings in the SDNY related to the Epstein case in mid-2020.
